txt.en:
'Very good! I hope you are enjoying our festivities for Midsummer!

'As a small token of thanks for sharing in our celebration, allow me to offer you this gift!

'Join us again tomorrow, won't you?'

As Midsummer's Day approaches, the peoples of Middle-earth come together to celebrate the great festival of Midsummer. Revel in the celebration of dance, merriment, and love with your family and fellows!
'Whether you join in the revelry here in Minas Tirith or in far-off lands, it is certain you will find yourself among merry company!\n\n'We ask only that you celebrate in the spirit of Midsummer!'

Midsummer celebrations can be found in Minas Tirith (Midsummer) as well as Thorin's Hall, Duillond, Bree-town, at the Party Tree in the Shire, and Furtherholm in the Shield Isles.\n\nAs Midsummer's Day approaches, the peoples of Middle-earth come together to celebrate the great festival of Midsummer. Revel in the celebration of dance, merriment, and love with your family and fellows!
Faeleth can be found in Minas Tirith (Midsummer).\n\nFaeleth would like to thank you for joining in the celebration of Midsummer.
Participated in the celebration of Midsummer ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Very good! I hope you are enjoying our festivities for Midsummer!

'As a small token of thanks for sharing in our celebration, allow me to offer you this gift!
